participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and laid-back, Emily enjoys sharing her interests and is open to new experiences.
participant_1.background: I'm not much of a fashionista but I do enjoy my hobbies. I just got a new sweater. I have two older brothers. I'm 5'7", but I only feel 5'2" when I'm wearing heels. I've never been to the west coast, but I really want to go.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Determined and nurturing, Michael loves to create and share experiences with those he cares about, especially his dog.
participant_2.background: I work from home, and it allows me to spend a lot of time with my dog. I'm proud of my ability to persevere through difficult times and continue to succeed in my career. My most exotic place was in the mountains of Nepal where I went hiking and got to see the Himalayas. I treasure my dog, Petrucci, more than anything else. I get nervous about my juicing bar, but I have a solid plan and I know it will work because I have the support of my family.

content.text: Hi! I'm glad we matched.  What's up?
Hey! I'm doing well. How are you?
I'm doing well! I just got a new sweater and I'm really excited about it.
That's awesome! What kind of sweater is it?
It's a grey sweater with a blue and white stripe. I really like it.
Cool! I love sweaters. I have a few that I really love.
Me too! I have one that I wear all the time.
What's your favorite thing to do when you're not wearing sweaters?
I like to go hiking and spend time with my family.
That sounds really nice. I love hiking too. I have a dog named Petrucci and I love taking him with me.
That's awesome! I've never been hiking with a dog before.
It's a lot of fun! He loves it.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I also like to cook and bake.
That's cool! I love to cook too.
Great! I'll send you my number.
